name: 2048 3D CardBoard Game
description:
The gameplay is very simple:

You can determine the direction of the cube by looking left and right. You can throw the cube by raising the glasses a little higher.

You have to destroy the cube by adding the cubes representing the numbers derived from their doubles and their multiples and combining them with the same ones, making 2028 and then 4096. The cube will continue to merge until it disappears.

At certain times, it destroys the cubes it hits by raining bombs from above. While this sometimes allows you to win the playing field. sometimes it can destroy the cube you need.

Requirements:
Cardboard
Android Smartphone
